trans-unit.source: Represents a standard Windows vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 代表標準的視窗垂直捲軸。

trans-unit.source: Most controls that need scroll bars already provide them and do not require this control.
trans-unit.target: 大部分需要已經捲軸的控制項提供它們，而且不需要這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is true of a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, for example.
trans-unit.target: 這是多行的則為 true<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，例如。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this control to implement scrolling in containers that do not provide their own scroll bars such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> or for user input of numeric data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個控制項來實作這類不提供自己的捲軸的容器中捲動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>或數值資料的使用者輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>

trans-unit.source: The numeric data can be displayed in a control or used in code.
trans-unit.target: 數值資料可以顯示在控制項或程式碼中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> properties determine the range of values the user can select.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>屬性會決定使用者可以選取的值的範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking within the scroll bar but outside the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>屬性會決定按一下捲軸內但是超出捲動方塊的效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking the scroll arrows at each end of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>屬性會決定按一下捲動箭號，在控制項的每一端的效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref>包含必要的建立參數時在建立控制項之控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
Gets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項的項目是否對齊，以支援使用由右至左字型的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> control cannot be set.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft*> property changes.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> control cannot be set, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> never raises the RightToLeftChanged event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>無法設定控制，所以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>永遠不會引發 RightToLeftChanged 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A>
